message:
Dear {{doc.tenant}},

We hope this email finds you well.

This is to confirm that we have received your rent payment for the lease contract {{doc.lease_contract}}. Below are the payment details:

Contract Information:

  • Rent Amount: {{doc.rent_amount}}
  • Lease Expiry Date: {{doc.expiry_date}}

Payment Information:

  • Payment Date: {{doc.payment_date}}
  • Amount Paid: {{doc.amount_paid}}
  • Payment Mode: {{doc.payment_mode}}

If you have any questions or require further assistance, please feel free to contact us.

Best regards,

SkyTrack Airport Management System

Email: skytrack.management.system@gmail.com
name: Rent payment Successful
subject: Rent Payment Confirmation for Lease Contract [{{doc.lease_contract}}]
